it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game

Class LegacyDamageBoardAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.LegacyDamageBoardAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DamageBoard

    public class LegacyDamageBoardAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements DamageBoard

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LegacyDamageBoardAdapter(DamageBoard innerDmgb)
      Adapter used inorder not to modify previous tests with slightly different damageboard implementation.

      • appendDamage

        public void appendDamage(Player player,
                         boolean canRealizeMarks)
                  throws DamageTrackFullException
        Description copied from interface: DamageBoard
        Adds a damage from the given player to the damage board. This also resolves any leftovers marks from the given Player if applicable.
        Specified by:
        appendDamage in interface DamageBoard
        Throws:
        DamageTrackFullException - if the damage board is full and no other damage is allowed to be added.
